description:
Minai is Wataru and Akio`s friend in Tokyo that was ranked second in grades to Wataru.
It`s obvious that he`s more concerned about being the number one student in their class, and when he sees Wataru again later in the series, he considers him a rival more than a friend.
Initially, he was part of their plan to become the elite men in society until Wataru`s failing the exam changed everything.
name: Miani
